posts.text:
Yukon Ranger Night Vision ( nætursjónauki). Ennþá í pakkningunum. 
The Yukon Ranger 28041 Digital NV Monocular is a Digital Night Vision Viewer with amazing features, that provides the clarity of Gen 2 Night Vision and powerful magnification. 
With one of the most powerful infrared illuminators ever released on the commercial market, Yukon Ranger Digital Night Vision Monocular is able to hook up to a television or monitor for an incredible observation experience. 
Ranger Digital Night Vision Scopes by Yukon Advanced Optics offer higher magnification that provides better detail, which can be further enhanced by the dual built-in Stealth Invisible IR Illuminators. 
This Monocular also features with outputs for direct video recording. Consumers now have the power to record night-time activities to a degree far superior than any video or surveillance system available.
Verð 80.000,-
Skoðið meira um tækið með því að smella á linkinn hér að neðan:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-n6RFhsqUcI
